Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Bowl
Description: Large bowl with a flat bottom, unrestricted opening, walls with a slightly convex cross-section and a simple lip. The clay is brown, bearing a pink slip that has peeled off. The vessel has been crudely manufactured and the surface has not been carefully levelled out.
